core_contributor.ui:help: Select an alternate Core Contributor if this request for goods and services is for someone else

project.ui:help: Project name for which the request is being raised

purpose.ui:placeholder: Describe the service/product you need to purchase and the reasons for it

criticality.ui:help: Indicate the request's criticality for the project

period.ui:help: Specify the preferred delivery date for this service/product

vendor.ui:help: Provide the full legal name of the potential vendor capable of delivering the service/product

payment_method.ui:help: Specify the expected payment method for this service/product

item_name.ui:placeholder: E.g. the name of the service/product, which app module, version, serial number, etc.

item_url.ui:help: Provide the URL for the selected goods/services

qty.ui:help: Specify the quantity of the requested service/product

unit_price.ui:placeholder: Price in fiat or crypto, incl. taxes
unit_price.ui:help: Use a period (full stop) to indicate the decimal separator, e.g. 12.45 (fiat) or 12.4513 (crypto)
